name: Nightmare at City Tech
description: Our game displays a  VR experience inside of New York City College Of Technology, where you will be placed into one of our class rooms and have to find your way out the building.  Given a horror theme our maze is designed to keep you on your toes wondering now to escape this nightmare inside City Tech. In order to survive you must escape through the elevator shaft , this will be no easy task try not to loose yourself in the process. Good Luck!
